question:
Online shopping is significantly increasing.

What effects does this have on the environment and the types of jobs required?
text: In recent days, shopping has become an effortless task, without going to the mall or expending too much hour searching for specific items. You can get what you want exactly with one click via the internet. This essay will explore the impact of online shopping on the environment and the types of work needed.

Nowadays online shopping is becoming popular in over the world. Shopping using the internet has a remarkable influence on the environment. A good illustration of this is reduced the traffic jam. People are able to purchase any stuff via the internet without going market by private car or other vehicles. By this way traffic jam is being reduced from the city or country. Another noticeable impact of online shopping is saving valuable moment and diminish the pollution causes. For instance, if individuals do not go to the shopping centre for buying products by using vehicles, that term pollution will be automatically removed from the country as well as people can save their term because they can use online shopping instead of going mall.

On the one hand, there are several opportunities of online shopping, one of the most noteworthy benefits of this is job facilities for a large number of people. Currently, many employees can work from home, which was unimaginable in the past. For instance, freelance, web designer, web developer and online supervisor are newly introduced works.On the other hand, a significant percentage of workers were forced to leave their jobs because of the newly specifications required in jobs which causes a kind of miss.

In conclusion, despite of some demerits, online shopping has brought an outstanding opportunity in our work place. Also online shopping has decreased pollution problems and traffic jam from our country.
